items.title: Hyundai Motor submits PFR to take up modernisation of Tamil Nadu plant at a cost of Rs 1,500 cr

items.title: Ashneer Grover withdraws oppression and mismanagement plea against BharatPe management

items.title: Vedanta to invest Rs 1 lakh cr in Odisha to set up alumina refinery and aluminium plant
items.description: The investment, the largest ever into Odisha, will be directed towards establishing a 6 million tons per annum alumina refinery and a 3 million tons aluminium plant, Vedanta said

items.title: Hindustan Zinc in discussions with govt to split company: CEO Arun Misra

items.title: RBI lifts restrictions on JM Financial from financing against shares and debentures
items.description: With this, the company is permitted to provide, with immediate effect, the financing against shares and debentures in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations
